summary:
Lockheed Martin is a huge American company that makes planes, weapons, and technology for defense and space. It was created in 1995 when two big companies merged. With over 115,000 employees, it's one of the largest in its industry.

The company works mostly with the U.S. government, supplying the military and other agencies. It makes things like the F-35 fighter jet and helps with space exploration. Lockheed Martin also works on cool projects like nuclear fusion and renewable energy.
title: Lockheed Martin
